How much can you save with Honeywell’s Maintenance Service Plans for Avionics?
Do you know the cost of repairing your Sky Connect Tracker System? Better yet, are you prepared to cover the costs and keep your helicopter mission ready? Take the uncertainty out of repair and maintenance costs. A fixed-price maintenance service plan for avionics contract guarantees that your repair bills won’t exceed your budget.
So, how does Honeywell’s Maintenance Service Plan for Avionics compare to repair costs? With minor repair costs about $50,000 – it isn’t cheap. With our plan you can:
- Avoid unplanned maintenance costs - Avoid downtime - Avoid unnecessary stress
To learn more about how to protect your investment, contact MASCO by phone at (337) 242-1653 <tel:(337) 242-1653> or by clicking the link below and filling out the form. Once filled out, a MASCO representative will reach out to you.
